content.en: Vortex analysis: Scientists have been exploring various algorithms to identify and analyze vortices in fluid flows. These algorithms use different criteria and techniques to detect and track vortices, such as invariants of velocity gradient tensor, variational approaches, vortex region criteria, and more. By applying these algorithms, researchers aim to better understand the behavior and characteristics of vortices in different types of flows, including turbulent and complex three-dimensional flows.
content.da: Vortexanalyse: Forskere har udforsket forskellige algoritmer til at identificere og analysere vortices i væskestrømme. Disse algoritmer bruger forskellige kriterier og teknikker til at opdage og spore vortices, såsom invariants af hastighedsgradienttensore, variationsmetoder, vortexregionkriterier og mere. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod bedre at forstå vortices' adfærd og egenskaber i forskellige typer strømme, herunder turbulente og komplekse tredimensionelle strømme.
